name: RDP to HTTP or HTTPS Target Ports
description: Detects svchost hosting RDP termsvcs communicating to target systems on TCP port 80 or 443
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND network.direction:/[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]/ AND source.port:3389 AND destination.port:(80 OR 443))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\svchost.exe AND network.direction:true AND source.port:3389 AND destination.port:(80 OR 443))`
